summary: The spirit of a comatose teenage girl possesses the body of a newcomer to her girls boarding school to enact bloody revenge against the elitist, lingerie-clad coeds responsible for her condition.
cast: Jared Martin|Lara Lamberti|Ulli Reinthaler|Sophie d'Aulan|Jennifer Naud|Riccardo Acerbi|Kathi Wise|Milijana Zirojevic|Dragan Bjelogrlic|Ljiljana Blagojevic|Franciska Spahic|Dusica Zegarac|Zorica Lesic|Zoran Lesic|Rade Colovic|Lucio Fulci|Sabrina Siani
keywords: male objectification|tank top|falling to one's death|sex scene|psychological
title: Aenigma
